identity.name: Nfadhfadh
identity.description: A bilingual emotional wellness sanctuary that blends professional trust with calming serenity.

typography.instructions: Use 'Cairo' for Arabic headings and 'Manrope' for English headings. Use 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic' for Arabic body text. Ensure line-height is increased (leading-loose) for Arabic text readability.

primary.description: Classic Blue - The anchor of trust and professionalism.

secondary.description: Baby Blue - The breath of fresh air and calm.

accent.description: Warm Sand - Adds human warmth to the blue palette.

rtl_strategy.instructions: CRITICAL: Use logical properties for spacing. NEVER use 'ml-' or 'mr-'. Use 'ms-' (margin-start) and 'me-' (margin-end). Use 'ps-' and 'pe-' for padding. Ensure 'dir=rtl' is applied to the html tag when Arabic is selected.

buttons.primary: bg-[#0F4C81] text-white hover:bg-[#0F4C81]/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-[#E0F2FE] text-[#0F4C81] hover:bg-[#BAE6FD] rounded-full px-8 py-6 transition-all duration-300

cards.style: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-white/50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#89CFF0] focus:border-transparent h-12 px-4

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/60' for sticky headers and overlays.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.04)]' for a soft, floating feel.

hero_background.description: Abstract blue swirls on white - use as a subtle background texture for the Hero section.

calm_water.description: Gentle ripples - use for the 'Mood Check-in' or 'Meditation' section background.

diary_writing.description: Person writing in diary - use for the 'Diary' feature promo.

abstract_texture.description: Textured blue background - use for the 'Subscription' or 'Premium' cards.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. RTL IMPLEMENTATION: This is the most critical constraint. You MUST use Tailwind's logical properties (ms-*, me-*, ps-*, pe-*) instead of physical ones (ml-*, mr-*, pl-*, pr-*).
2. LANGUAGE TOGGLE: Implement a global context for language. When Arabic is active, add 'dir=rtl' to the root html element and switch fonts to 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic'/'Cairo'.
3. THEME: Default to Light Mode. The 'Corporate Zen' aesthetic relies on whitespace and soft blues. Do not make it dark by default.
4. SHADCN: Customize the default Shadcn components. Increase border-radius to 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-2xl' to soften the corporate feel. Remove sharp edges.
5. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the glass styles defined in 'visual_enhancers' for the Dashboard Sidebar and Top Navigation to create a layered, airy feel.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders. If you need more, use the style of the provided images (abstract, blue, calming) as a reference.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards) for testing.
8. ANIMATION: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions. A gentle 'fade-in-up' (opacity: 0 -> 1, y: 20 -> 0) is perfect for this brand.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. No centered text blocks without purpose.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs. 'p-8' is the new 'p-4'.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) instead.
Interactive elements must have clear hover states (transform, color change).
